name: Empty RNA sequence results in no proteins
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Empty RNA sequence results in no proteins" do
    expected = []
    actual = proteins ""
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Methionine RNA sequence
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Methionine RNA sequence" do
    expected = ["Methionine"]
    actual = proteins "AUG"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Phenylalanine RNA sequence 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Phenylalanine RNA sequence 1" do
    expected = ["Phenylalanine"]
    actual = proteins "UUU"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: STOP codon RNA sequence 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "STOP codon RNA sequence 1" do
    expected = []
    actual = proteins "UAA"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Sequence of two protein codons translates into proteins
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Sequence of two protein codons translates into proteins" do
    expected = ["Phenylalanine", "Phenylalanine"]
    actual = proteins "UUUUUU"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Sequence of two different protein codons translates into proteins
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Sequence of two different protein codons translates into proteins" do
    expected = ["Leucine", "Leucine"]
    actual = proteins "UUAUUG"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Translate RNA strand into correct protein list
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Translate RNA strand into correct protein list" do
    expected = ["Methionine", "Phenylalanine", "Tryptophan"]
    actual = proteins "AUGUUUUGG"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Translation stops if STOP codon at beginning of sequence
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Translation stops if STOP codon at beginning of sequence" do
    expected = []
    actual = proteins "UAGUGG"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Translation stops if STOP codon at end of two-codon sequence
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Translation stops if STOP codon at end of two-codon sequence" do
    expected = ["Tryptophan"]
    actual = proteins "UGGUAG"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Translation stops if STOP codon at end of three-codon sequence
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Translation stops if STOP codon at end of three-codon sequence" do
    expected = ["Methionine", "Phenylalanine"]
    actual = proteins "AUGUUUUAA"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Translation stops if STOP codon in middle of three-codon sequence
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Translation stops if STOP codon in middle of three-codon sequence" do
    expected = ["Tryptophan"]
    actual = proteins "UGGUAGUGG"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Translation stops if STOP codon in middle of six-codon sequence
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Translation stops if STOP codon in middle of six-codon sequence" do
    expected = ["Tryptophan", "Cysteine", "Tyrosine"]
    actual = proteins "UGGUGUUAUUAAUGGUUU"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
